archimate:Grouping.name: Architectural Building Blocks Affecting SOGP Compliance
archimate:Grouping.documentation:
When several architectural building blocks are affected by Control Measures, adherence to the predefined Stubs/Statements while defining the Controls results in a positive influence on SOGP Compliance. Otherwise, the influence is negative on the Topic realization and any other referenced standard.
Architectural Building Blocks, akin to 'lego bricks,' are standard components used in various planning stages to ensure consistency and reusability across projects.
This grouping element is only meant to be a an example in the meta modelling structure view.
